title: Bank Negara Indonesia 3Q Net Profit Up 4.7% On Year
text:
By Yi Wei Wong

Bank Negara Indonesia (BBNI.JK) reported that its third-quarter net profit grew 4.7% on year, helped by strong credit growth.

Net profit in the September quarter was 12 trillion rupiah (US$857.1 million), compared with IDR11.4 trillion in the same quarter last year, the Indonesian state-owned lender said in an investor presentation.

Net interest income for the third quarter grew 3.3% on year to IDR26.8 trillion. Net interest margin, however, fell 0.4 percentage point to 4.9%.

Bank Negara Indonesia said that asset quality in the third quarter had also improved, with non-performing loans ratio down to 1.8%, from 2.0% in the same period of last year.

Write to Yi Wei Wong at yiwei.wong@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 23, 2019 22:47 ET (02:47 GMT)
